Html: Maybe I'm missing something here but I can't find the source code for the samples. I downloaded "DynamicDataDisplay v0.3 Binaries & Samples" but there are only binaries in the samples folder. Is the source available from somewhere else?

Click the Download button on the 'Source Code' tab for the latest nightly.

Or the 'DynamicDataDisplay v0.3 Source' link in the 'Other Available Downloads' section on the Download page for the stable source.
